entry.title: Pasadena Star News Obituary for Lois Shotlow

link.title: Pasadena Star News Obituary for Lois Shotlow

entry.content: Lois Margaret Shotlow, passed away September 16, 2008. She is survived by her husband, Freddie B. Shotlow; one daughter, Letitia Stellern; one son, Frederick Blair Shotlow; one granddaughter, Lani Marie Shotlow-Rincon and a host of other relatives and friends.

entry.title: Remembering Lois Shotlow
entry.content:
WE Love You Mom

Lois M. Shotlow passed away on Tuesday, September 16, 2008. She will be missed by family and friends.
